content: Utah does not collect Disposition Location Address Line 1 and Zip. I am not sure if this is a cardinality fix in the IG or a Canary fix. Disposition-Location.JPG

Hi @valli chidambaram, as @Sarah MacAdam mentioned in another thread you can ignore errors for fields that you don't collect. I'll additionally suggest that, where there should be cardinality fixes in the IG, you submit a ticket via https://jira.hl7.org/
